trans-unit.source: AVIF is disabled because it's not supported on your server, check your configuration if you want to use it.
trans-unit.target: AVIF is disabled because it's not supported on your server, check your configuration if you want to use it.

trans-unit.source: Add new page
trans-unit.target: Add new page

trans-unit.source: Add new page category
trans-unit.target: Add new page category

trans-unit.source: Be careful! Please check your theme in an RTL language before generating the RTL stylesheet: your theme could be already adapted to RTL. Once you enable the "%generate_rtl_label%" option, any RTL-specific file that you might have added to your theme might be deleted by the created stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: Be careful! Please check your theme in an RTL language before generating the RTL stylesheet: your theme could be already adapted to RTL. Once you enable the "%generate_rtl_label%" option, any RTL-specific file that you might have added to your theme might be deleted by the created stylesheet.

trans-unit.source: Because it is not just selling products but also creating a universe, build pages to tell stories and catch your visitors’ interest, to turn them into loyal customers.
trans-unit.target: Because it is not just selling products but also creating a universe, build pages to tell stories and catch your visitors’ interest, to turn them into loyal customers.

trans-unit.source: Beware that to benefit from modern image formats, they must be supported by your theme.
trans-unit.target: Beware that to benefit from modern image formats, they must be supported by your theme.

trans-unit.source: Browse your computer files and select the Zip file for your new theme.
trans-unit.target: Browse your computer files and select the Zip file for your new theme.

trans-unit.source: By default, all images settings are already installed in your store. Do not delete them, you will need it!
trans-unit.target: By default, all images settings are already installed in your store. Do not delete them, you will need it!

trans-unit.source: By default, existing email template files are not modified to avoid deleting any modification you may have done. Enable this option to force the overwrite.
trans-unit.target: By default, existing email template files are not modified to avoid deleting any modification you may have done. Enable this option to force the overwrite.

trans-unit.source: Choose which image formats you want to be generated. Base image will always have .jpg extension, other formats will have .webp or .avif. Think twice before enabling all of them, because it can easily double the size of your shop.
trans-unit.target: Choose which image formats you want to be generated. Base image will always have .jpg extension, other formats will have .webp or .avif. Think twice before enabling all of them, because it can easily double the size of your shop.

trans-unit.source: Create meaningful content
trans-unit.target: Create meaningful content

trans-unit.source: E.g. address, addresses, attachment
trans-unit.target: E.g. address, addresses, attachment

trans-unit.source: Edit page category
trans-unit.target: Edit page category

trans-unit.source: Height of product customization pictures that customers can upload (in pixels).
trans-unit.target: Height of product customization pictures that customers can upload (in pixels).

trans-unit.source: If you check a field, change its value, and save, the multistore behavior will not apply to this shop (or group), for this particular parameter.
trans-unit.target: If you check a field, change its value, and save, the multistore behavior will not apply to this store (or group), for this particular parameter.

trans-unit.source: Indicate the complete URL to an online Zip file that contains your new theme. For instance, "http://example.com/files/theme.zip".
trans-unit.target: Indicate the complete URL to an online Zip file that contains your new theme. For instance, "http://example.com/files/theme.zip".

trans-unit.source: It is the small icon that appears in browser tabs, next to the title.
trans-unit.target: It is the small icon that appears in browser tabs, next to the title.

trans-unit.source: Letters, underscores and hyphens only (e.g. "small_custom", "cart_medium", "large", "thickbox_extra-large").
trans-unit.target: Letters, underscores and hyphens only (e.g. "small_custom", "cart_medium", "large", "thickbox_extra-large").

trans-unit.source: Maximum image height in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Maximum image height in pixels.

trans-unit.source: Maximum image width in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Maximum image width in pixels.

trans-unit.source: Most common setup is to have the base JPG/PNG format and one modern WebP or AVIF format - the browser will choose the format it likes the most.
trans-unit.target: Most common setup is to have the base JPG/PNG format and one modern WebP or AVIF format - the browser will choose the format it likes the most.

trans-unit.source: No emails were detected in any theme folder so this field is disabled.
trans-unit.target: No emails were detected in any theme folder so this field is disabled.

trans-unit.source: PNG compression is lossless: unlike JPG, you do not lose image quality with a high compression ratio. However, photographs will compress very badly.
trans-unit.target: PNG compression is lossless: unlike JPG, you do not lose image quality with a high compression ratio. However, photographs will compress very badly.

trans-unit.source: Please input each filename, separated by a comma (",").
trans-unit.target: Please input each filename, separated by a comma (",").

trans-unit.source: Please select a module
trans-unit.target: Please select a module

trans-unit.source: Please specify the files for which you do not want the module to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Please specify the files for which you do not want the module to be displayed.

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop's email templates are stored in the "mails" folder, but they can be overridden by your current theme's own "mails" folder. Using this option enables to overwrite emails from your current theme.
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop's email templates are stored in the "mails" folder, but they can be overridden by your current theme's own "mails" folder. Using this option enables to overwrite emails from your current theme.

trans-unit.source: Ranges from 0 (biggest file) to 9 (smallest file, slowest decompression).
trans-unit.target: Ranges from 0 (biggest file) to 9 (smallest file, slowest decompression).

trans-unit.source: Ranges from 0 (worst quality, smallest file) to 100 (best quality, biggest file).
trans-unit.target: Ranges from 0 (worst quality, smallest file) to 100 (best quality, biggest file).

trans-unit.source: Recommended: %d.
trans-unit.target: Recommended: %d.

trans-unit.source: Select "No" only if your server timed out and you need to resume the regeneration.
trans-unit.target: Select "No" only if your server timed out and you need to resume the regeneration.

trans-unit.source: Select a module above before choosing from available hooks
trans-unit.target: Select a module above before choosing from available hooks

trans-unit.source: The maximum file size of pictures that customers can upload to customize a product (in bytes).
trans-unit.target: The maximum file size of pictures that customers can upload to customize a product (in bytes).

trans-unit.source: The original images of objects you create are almost never used, optimized thumbnails are used instead. In this section, you can define the formats of thumbnails and their quality.
trans-unit.target: The original images of objects you create are almost never used, optimized thumbnails are used instead. In this section, you can define the formats of thumbnails and their quality.

trans-unit.source: This selector lists the Zip files that you uploaded in the '/themes' folder.
trans-unit.target: This selector lists the Zip files that you uploaded in the '/themes' folder.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Brand images.
trans-unit.target: This type will be used for Brand images.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Category images.
trans-unit.target: This type will be used for Category images.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Product images.
trans-unit.target: This type will be used for Product images.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Store images.
trans-unit.target: This type will be used for Store images.

trans-unit.source: This type will be used for Supplier images.
trans-unit.target: This type will be used for Supplier images.

trans-unit.source: This won't regenerate email templates, it only sets the default email theme for future generation (when a language is installed for example).
trans-unit.target: This won't regenerate email templates, it only sets the default email theme for future generation (when a language is installed for example).

trans-unit.source: Used in the h1 page tag, and as the default title tag value.
trans-unit.target: Used in the h1 page tag, and as the default title tag value.

trans-unit.source: Used to override the title tag value. If left blank, the default title value is used.
trans-unit.target: Used to override the title tag value. If left blank, the default title value is used.

trans-unit.source: Warning: if no invoice logo is available, the main logo will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Warning: if no invoice logo is available, the main logo will be used instead.

trans-unit.source: Width of product customization pictures that customers can upload (in pixels).
trans-unit.target: Width of product customization pictures that customers can upload (in pixels).

trans-unit.source: Will appear on email headers. If undefined, the header logo will be used.
trans-unit.target: Will appear on email headers. If undefined, the header logo will be used.

trans-unit.source: Will appear on invoice headers.
trans-unit.target: Will appear on invoice headers.

trans-unit.source: Will appear on your main page. Recommended size for the default theme: height %height% and width %width%.
trans-unit.target: Will appear on your main page. Recommended size for the default theme: height %height% and width %width%.

trans-unit.source: You are editing this page for a specific shop or group. Click "%yes_label%" to check all fields, "%no_label%" to uncheck all.
trans-unit.target: You are editing this page for a specific shop or group. Click "%yes_label%" to check all fields, "%no_label%" to uncheck all.

trans-unit.source: You can also click the filename in the list below, and even make a multiple selection by keeping the Ctrl key pressed while clicking, or choose a whole range of filename by keeping the Shift key pressed while clicking.
trans-unit.target: You can also click the filename in the list below, and even make a multiple selection by keeping the Ctrl key pressed while clicking, or choose a whole range of filename by keeping the Shift key pressed while clicking.

trans-unit.source: You must select a shop from the above list if you wish to choose a theme.
trans-unit.target: You must select a shop from the above list if you wish to choose a theme.
